description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Orange Logic is an industry leader in Digital Asset Management. We are a software company with a unique product designed to manage, share, and scale our client’s digital libraries. Our robust solution supports customers such as Boeing, The BBC, AirBnB, Facebook, United Nations, Greenpeace, and the World Wildlife Fund. With offices in the United States, UK, France, and Ho Chi Minh City, we are growing rapidly and loving it.
              
              Growth comes with awesome challenges and we would like passionate professionals in Ho Chi Minh City to become a part of our solution.
              

              RESPONSIBILITIES:
              

              - Coordinate with the consulting company to perform the accounting and payroll tasks
              
              - Maintain stock lists and order office supplies as needed
              
              - Create and update records and databases with personnel, financial, and other data
              
              - Help us to build an open and fun-working environment
              
              - Support the HR team in recruiting and new employee onboarding if needed
              
              - Other assignments by CEO
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              REQUIREMENTS:
              

              - The most successful candidate for this role will have a:
              
              - Bachelor’s Degree in any related field
              
              - Minimum of 1-year experience in office administration
              
              - Good command of the English language (oral and written)
              
              - Strong attention to detail, is sharp, and trustworthy
              

              WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE
              

              - Orange Logic will provide you with a challenging and rewarding environment that will enhance your professional skills. As a full-time employee, you will be eligible for our benefits program which includes:
              
              - A competitive 13-month salary, which is full-paid upon joining
              
              - An attractive performance-based bonus, including a year-end bonus an annual Tet gift
              
              - 18 business days of annual leave, plus an annual company trip
              
              - A variety of allowances (e.g. lunch, parking, gym, and birthday voucher)
              
              - Premium medical insurance package
              
              - Happy hours and team building
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
